Name: Demonic Blade
About the game: Tom's life wasn't exactly normal. And it will get even worse. Sarah's hope is gone. But will she regain it? Anna just wants to live a normal life. But she knows she never will. Follow the story of three characters, as they struggle to find their purpose in the world they found themselves in. A modern, urban fantasy Visual Novel. Action, drama, mysteries. What you'll get: about 3-4 hours of the story (depending on reading speed and your imagination) atmospheric post-rock music (including a few vocal tracks)
